website_summaries.verdict: Reward yourself a piece of heaven with the comfort that the Taos Capitol brings. It also has a trendy design that can level up outfits. A balance of comfort and style is what the Capitol sneaker offers to users of all ages. Plus, people who use custom orthotics may also enjoy wearing this sneaker as it is designed to provide metatarsal and arch support.
pros: The Taos Capital has a cushioned footbed that provides all-day comfort, according to a lot of reviewers
Some shoppers have attested that it is a good-quality shoe
It is among the Taos sneakers with an adorable and stylish design that is appreciated by many customers
A few with foot issues like plantar fibroma and fasciitis say that they can comfortably wear the low-top Taos Capitol even without their custom orthotics
It offers decent arch support, as per a couple of users
A couple of respondents have shared that they receive compliments when they wear the Taos footwear
The Taos Capitol sneaker is recommended by most of the reviewers
cons: A couple of purchasers have stated that the low-top Taos Capitol footwear fits a bit tight or narrow on the toe area

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so very cute & well made, but I have wide feet so they were too narrow. I have Taos sandals which tend to run a little wider & fit perfectly, so I was hoping it would be the same with this shoe. I know they make a wide width in their canvas shoe which is similar to this, but I prefer leather.
customer_reviews.author: T. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be really cute, however, they look like bowling or clowns shoes once they are on. Sadly, the went back.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The arch support is great. I ordered my typical size and it was perfect. I have a regular width foot but it leans toward the narrow side. I loosened the laces a bit. It seems to me that these would not be good for a foot that is a little bit wide.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 things wrong in my right foot including a Morton's neuroma which can be very painful when I walk. Taos is one of the few brands of shoes I can wear and do well with. It has a little wider toe box and perfect arch support which is what I need! This is the only brand that is consistent in the fit and in the support it gives! Plus these shoes are super cute. I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure which I love most, the worn look of the shoe or the excellent fit/support. They are rapidly becoming one of my favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. I ordered them in two sizes. The larger size fit but the outer sole is thin and and the insole isn't supportive. I returned both pairs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Franz

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made casual shoe with a nice arch. I have a narrow foot and the arch support helps hold my foot where it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing support
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is the heel area is low and a little loose. Been breaking in on a treadmill since winter isn't letting me be outside to hopefully get ready to use on a trip to Italy. So far no issues/rubs etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Fantastic arch and don't need any breaking ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my fourth pair. Love them. Fantastic arch and don't need any breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen L. lelko

customer_reviews.title: Great Style
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the style, but thought that they ran a bit narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! My second pair. I did go up 1/2 a size. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Toad shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and it is a great fit for a narrow foot
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wiezorek

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I have two other Taos sneakers and they fit my normal 7.5M foot perfectly. These are really pretty but sadly they were way too narrow, super tight and uncomfortable so I am returning them. Ordering the Taos Freedom which I know fits in the Metallic Taupe color.
customer_reviews.author: E. Grier

product_meta.title: Taos womens Capitol
product_meta.description: The Capitol is where your feet and comfort footwear will meet each day. Experience the the all day sneaker that will have your feet submerged in comfort style. Capitol provide great arch and metatarsal support every step along the way.
